list.title: MyDogeWallet#connect
list.description: Initiates a connection request with the wallet.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#disconnect
list.description: Disconnects the current session with the wallet.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#getBalance
list.description: Retrieves the balance from the connected wallet.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#getConnectionStatus
list.description: Retrieves the connection status with the wallet.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#getDRC20Balance
list.description: Retrieves the DRC20 token balance based on provided data.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#getDunesBalance
list.description: Retrieves the Dunes token balance based on provided data.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#getTransactionStatus
list.description: Retrieves the status of a specific transaction based on provided data.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#getTransferableDRC20
list.description: Retrieves transferable DRC20 inscriptions based on provided data.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#requestAvailableDRC20Transaction
list.description: Requests a transaction for available DRC20 tokens based on specified data.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#requestDecryptedMessage
list.description: Requests the decrypting of an arbitrary message encrypted by the connected address public key.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#requestDunesTransaction
list.description: Requests a transaction for Dunes tokens based on specified data.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#requestInscriptionTransaction
list.description: Requests an inscription transaction for Doginal/DRC-20 based on the specified data.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#requestPsbt
list.description: Requests the signing of a partially signed Bitcoin transaction (PSBT) based on provided data.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#requestSignedMessage
list.description: Requests the signing of an arbitrary message based on provided data.

list.title: MyDogeWallet#requestTransaction
list.description: Requests a Dogecoin transaction based on the specified data.
